title._content: The young and affectionate mother fleeing to save her precious babe, Galveston Disaster.

description._content: Title: The young and affectionate mother fleeing to save her precious babe, Galveston Disaster. Creator: International Stereoscopic View Co. Date: September 9, 1900 Part Of: Banks McLaurin, Jr. stereograph collection Physical Description: 1 photographic print on stereo card: stereograph, gelatin silver; 8.9 x 17.8 cm File: ag2000_1296_01_d04_tex_09r_galstorm_opt.jpg Rights: Please cite Southern Methodist University, Central University Libraries, DeGolyer Library when using this image file. A high-quality version of this file may be obtained for a fee by contacting degolyer@smu.edu. For more information, see: digitalcollections.smu.edu/cdm/ref/collection/bml/id/150 View U.S. West: Photographers, Manuscripts, and Imprints: digitalcollections.smu.edu/cdm/landingpage/collection/bml
